Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~mastersingh24 Looks like you last touched the certs for basic-network. Is there a reason to include them rather than generating them?

Action.author: zamrokk
Action.body: CRIT 003 Error on outputChannelCreateTx: config update generation failure: could not parse application to application group: setting up the MSP manager failed: the supplied identity is not valid: x509: certificate signed by unknown authority (possibly because of "x509: ECDSA verification failure" while trying to verify candidate authority certificate "ca.org1.example.com") It works fine only from the .tx binary committed on git I use the V1.1.0-alpha >

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~ales and ~adc will discuss this and provide their thoughts, since generating certs has been a topic a recent discussion.

Action.author: zamrokk
Action.body: It could be related to this problem too : https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-3285?page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels%3Acomment-tabpanel&focusedCommentId=40650#comment-40650

Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: ~adc : What seems to be the issue here?
